docs.summary: Manage Bookings checkout flow, calculate checkout options and integrate with payment related services.

params.name: paymentSelection
params.doc: Selected rate label (optional) to be used, and number of participants.

params.name: couponCode
params.doc: Coupon to apply to price calculations. An error will be thrown if given coupon is invalid.

params.name: contactId
params.doc: Member ID for which paid plans will be accessed.

docs.summary:
Calculates checkout options available to book and check out the given session/schedule.
> **Permissions**  
> This endpoint requires the Read Bookings - Public Data, Read Bookings - Including Participants or Manage Bookings permission scope.  
 To calculate the Wix Paid Plans available for a site member using the `contactId` field, the Manage Bookings permission scope is required.

extra.description: Returns the checkout options for a session. The response describes paid plans that can be used to pay for the booking.
Returns the checkout options for a session. The response describes an online payment is required.
Returns the checkout options for the given schedule id.

members.name: amount
members.doc: The price amount

members.name: currency
members.doc: Currency

members.name: downPayAmount
members.doc: Optional. Represents a required down payment as part of the transaction process.

members.name: id
members.doc: Checkout identifier.

members.name: balance
members.doc: The booking Balance.

members.name: paidPlanDetails
members.doc: Paid plan details used to pay for the booking.

members.name: couponDetails
members.doc: temporarily in-out , when available indicate coupon usage.

members.name: wixPayDetails
members.doc: [DEPRECATED]. USE wix_pay_multiple_details.

members.name: state
members.doc: Checkout current state.

members.name: wixPayMultipleDetails
members.doc: In case of wix-pay service, holds all payment history for a booking.

members.name: finalPrice
members.doc:
The final calculated price.
 Calculated using the service price multiplied by the booking's number of participants deducted any discount (coupons, etc.)

members.name: amountReceived
members.doc: Amount paid.

members.name: plan
members.doc: Plan details

members.name: planName
members.doc: Plan name

members.name: transactionId
members.doc: Transaction id created in Paid Plans Benefit service.

members.name: txId
members.doc: Cashier transaction Id

members.name: orderId
members.doc: Cashier order Id

members.name: orderAmount
members.doc: The order amount we issued to Cashier.

members.name: orderStatus
members.doc: Transaction status

members.name: paymentVendorName
members.doc: Payment vendor name

docs.summary:
Payment options for this service. Multiple payment options can be enabled. For example:
For a service to be paid only online using WiX, then set wix_pay_online=true and the rest should be set to false.
For a service to accept payment online via WiX or in person, set the wix_pay_online=true & wix_pay_in_person=true.

members.name: wixPayOnline
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid online through Wix.

members.name: wixPayInPerson
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid in person.

members.name: custom
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid in a custom way which is up to the API user to define.

members.name: wixPaidPlan
members.doc: Whether a booking made for this service can be paid using Wix paid plans, e.g., memberships or packages.

docs.summary: this message is as a result of the various checkout/update flows.

members.name: defaultPlan
members.doc: The plan that should be used for checkout by default. calculated according to internal heuristic.

members.name: plans
members.doc: Other plans available for checkout.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact identifier used in Contact Service.  this field is read-only except in Book method.

members.name: firstName
members.doc: Contact first name.

members.name: lastName
members.doc: Contact last name.

members.name: email
members.doc: Contact email. Mandatory field. used to create a new contact or get existing one from Contacts Service.

members.name: phone
members.doc: Contact phone.

members.name: address
members.doc: Contact address.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Contact time-zone.

members.name: countryCode
members.doc: Contact country of origin

members.name: rateLabel
members.doc: The label represent this booking rate, or free/custom if unspecified.

members.name: numberOfParticipants
members.doc: The number of participants register to this booking. Mandatory field.

docs.summary:
Time periods that this location is open for business. Includes a collection of TimePeriod instances.
Aligned with https://developers.google.com/my-business/reference/rest/v4/accounts.locations#businesshours
With a few minor adjustments

members.name: periods
members.doc:
Times that this location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: specialHourPeriod
members.doc: Exceptions to the business's regular hours.

docs.summary:
A span of time that the business is open,
starting on the specified open day/time and closing on the specified close day/time.
Closing time must occur after the opening time, for example later in the same day, or on a subsequent day.

members.name: openDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period starts on.

members.name: openTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

members.name: closeDay
members.doc: Day of the week this period ends on.

members.name: closeTime
members.doc:
Time in 24hr ISO 8601 extended format (hh:mm). Valid values are 00:00-24:00, where 24:00 represents
midnight at the end of the specified day field.

docs.summary: Set of time periods when a location's operational hours differ from its normal business hours.

members.name: startDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: endDate
members.doc: Date and Time in 24hr iso-8601 Coordinated universal time (UTC)

members.name: id
members.doc: The ID of the location

members.name: name
members.doc: Display name of the location

members.name: description
members.doc: Free text to better describe the location

members.name: default
members.doc:
Boolean that states the default location.
There can one default location per site, and changes on it affect on the Site Properties.
The default location can't be deleted and can be only marked through SetDefaultLocation api

members.name: status
members.doc: Status of the location. Active by default

members.name: locationType
members.doc: Type of the location

members.name: fax
members.doc: Fax number

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: Time zone

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number

members.name: address
members.doc: Address

members.name: businessSchedule
members.doc:
Represents the time periods that this location is open for business. Holds a collection of TimePeriod instances.
TimePeriod indicates when the location is open. Each period represents a range of hours when the location is
open during the week. Limited to 100 time periods.

members.name: revision
members.doc: Location revision, represent the number of changes on the location

members.name: archived
members.doc:
Boolean that states if the location is archived.
Archived location can't be updated.

members.name: country
members.doc: country code

members.name: subdivision
members.doc: subdivision (usually state or region) code according to ISO 3166-2

members.name: city
members.doc: city name

members.name: postalCode
members.doc: zip/postal code

members.name: streetAddress
members.doc: A break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: formattedAddress
members.doc: A string containing the human-readable address of this location

members.name: hint
members.doc: Free text for human-to-human textual orientation aid purposes

members.name: geocode
members.doc: coordinates of the physical address

members.name: hintPlacement
members.doc: Where the hint should be displayed

docs.summary: A break down of the street to number and street name

members.name: number
members.doc: street number

members.name: name
members.doc: street name

members.name: apt
members.doc: apartment number

docs.summary: Address Geolocation

members.name: latitude
members.doc: Latitude

members.name: longitude
members.doc: Longitude

members.name: address
members.doc: The address as set by the owner. Valid only when location_type is OWNER_CUSTOM.

messages.name: labeledPriceOptionsMapEntry
messages.displayName: labeled Price Options Map Entry Object

docs.summary: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: key:value
members.doc: `key` of type string, `value` of type object

members.name: labeledPriceOptions
members.doc: Set of key-value pairs.Mapping between a named price option and the Price itself.

members.name: priceText
members.doc: User defined textual price. Optional.

members.name: rate
members.doc: The price options offered to book this session at the time of booking.

members.name: location
members.doc: Geographic location of the session.

members.name: title
members.doc: Session title at the time of booking.

members.name: onlineConference
members.doc: Online conference information

members.name: guestUrl
members.doc: participant url

members.name: providerId
members.doc: online conference provider identifier

members.name: password
members.doc: online conference password

members.name: start
members.doc: The start time of the session.

members.name: end
members.doc: The end time of the session.

members.name: firstSessionStart
members.doc: The start time of the first session.

members.name: lastSessionEnd
members.doc: The end time of the last session.

members.name: id
members.doc: Participant ID. Required to be provided the api user when adding a participant. The id must be unique.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Contact ID (optional).

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the registered participant (optional).

members.name: phone
members.doc: Phone number of the contact (optional).

members.name: email
members.doc: Email address of the contact (optional).

members.name: partySize
members.doc: Party size (optional). Defaults to 0. Min value is 0, max value is 250.

members.name: approvalStatus
members.doc: Approval status for the participant. Defaults to UNDEFINED.

members.name: inherited
members.doc:
Whether the participant was inherited from the schedule. Read only.
Inherited from schedule means the participant is registered in this session, because he is registered in the schedule which includes this session.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Schedule Identifier.

members.name: transparency
members.doc: Indicates if the schedule is available during the session. Possible values are: FREE - the schedule is available during the session. BUSY - schedule are not available during the session, this is the default value.

members.name: scheduleOwnerId
members.doc: The linked schedule owner id. Read only. Derived from the schedule_id.

members.name: title
members.doc: Optional. When provided this value will be used in the synced title of the external calendar event. Default is Session.title

members.name: description
members.doc: Optional. When provided this value will be used in the synced description of the external calendar event.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc:
The time in seconds of UTC time since Unix epoch. Optional.
Required if the localDateTime field is not specified.
If the local date time is given then this field will be ignored and will be calculated from
the local date time and the business timezone.

members.name: localDateTime
members.doc:
The time in local date time. Optional.
If the this field is specified then the timestamp will be ignored and will be calculated from
this local date time and the business timezone.

members.name: timeZone
members.doc: The time zone. Optional.

members.name: id
members.doc: The conference meeting ID (In WiX Calendar)

members.name: externalId
members.doc: The conference meeting ID in the provider's conferencing system

members.name: providerId
members.doc: The provider Id

members.name: hostUrl
members.doc: URL used by the host to start the conference meeting

members.name: guestUrl
members.doc: URL used by a guest to join the conference meeting

members.name: password
members.doc: Password to join the conference.

members.name: id
members.doc:
Identifier for this session when session is a single session or generated from a recurring session.
When creating a session, any value in this field is ignored and a new ID is generated.
When updating a session it is required.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc:
Schedule identifier. The schedule of the session. Required.
Session must be under specific schedule.

members.name: scheduleOwnerId
members.doc: The schedule owner id. Read only. Derived from the schedule_id.

members.name: originalStart
members.doc: The original start time of the session in the result. Optional.

members.name: start
members.doc:
The start time of the session. Required.
If the recurrence field is given, it must contain a local date/time.

members.name: end
members.doc:
The end time of the session. Required.
The end time must be after the start time and with the same calendar date time field.
If the recurrence field is given, it must contain a local date/time.

members.name: affectedSchedules
members.doc:
Specifies the list of linked schedules and the way this link affects the corresponding schedules' availability.
Can be calculated from the schedule intervals or overridden on the Session.
Currently, only one schedule is supported.

members.name: title
members.doc:
The textual title of the session, i.e. A service name. Optional. The default value is the title in the schedule.
If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: tags
members.doc:
Tags of the session. Optional. The default value is the tags in the schedule.
If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: location
members.doc:
Geographic location of the session as free-form text. Optional.
The default value is the location in the schedule.
For single sessions, `session.location.businessLocation` can only be provided for locations which were defined in the schedule (`schedule.location` or `schedule.availability.locations`)

members.name: capacity
members.doc:
The maximum number of participants that can be added to the session. Optional.
The default value is the capacity in the schedule.
If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: rate
members.doc:
The price options offered to participate this session. Optional. The default value is the schedule rate.
If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: timeReservedAfter
members.doc:
Time reserved after session end time. Read only.
Derived from the schedule availability constraints time between slots.
If the recurrence field is given, this field must be empty.

members.name: notes
members.doc:
The note of the session. Indicating additional information about the session. Optional.
The default is empty notes.
If the recurrence field is given, this field must be empty.

members.name: totalNumberOfParticipants
members.doc:
The current number of registered participants on this session. Read only.
Calculated by the number of participants plus the additional participants.

members.name: participants
members.doc:
The registered participants of this session.
This list includes participants who have registered for this specific session, and also participants who have registered for a schedule that includes this session ("inherited" from the schedule).
Participants can be added or removed using the Schedules service Participant API.
If the recurrence field is given, this field must be empty.

members.name: inheritedFields
members.doc:
A list of fields for which values were inherited from the schedule.
Note: Participants which were inherited from the schedule, will be marked separately in the list of participants.

members.name: externalCalendarOverrides
members.doc:
Optional. When provided, the values will be used to override default fields values which are synced to external calendar.
Read more in external calendar documentation. The default is the schedule external calendar overrides.
If the recurrence field is given, the value is read only and inherited from the schedule.

members.name: status
members.doc:
Status of the session. Optional. Possible values are:
 CONFIRMED: This is the default value.
 CANCELLED: The value in any one of the following of cases:
    * The session was generated from a recurring session and then got deleted.
    * The session was created as a single session and then was deleted.
    * The session is a recurring session and then was deleted.

members.name: recurringIntervalId
members.doc:
Recurring interval ID. Defined when a session will be a recurring session. Read only. Optional.
For exmaple, when creating a class service  with recurring sessions, you add a recurrence rule to create recurring sessions.
This field is omitted for single sessions or instances of recurring sessions.
Specified when the session was originally generated from a schedule recurring interval.
Deprecated. please use recurringSessionId.

members.name: recurringSessionId
members.doc:
Recurring session ID. Read only. Optional.
Specified when the session was originally generated from a recurring session.

members.name: type
members.doc:
The type of the session.
Can be event or working hours session that represent available time of the schedule owner.
The default is event.

members.name: calendarConference
members.doc:
Holding the conference meeting created when the session is created, according to the details set in the Schedule's conference provider information.
If the recurrence field is given, this field must be empty.

members.name: recurrence
members.doc:
This field is used for a recurring session.
It contains a string representing one RRULE (recurrence rule) value as defined in RFC5545. Optional.
The RRULE property defines a rule for repeating the session. It is composed of several parameters.
Supported parameters are:
  FREQ — The frequency with which the session should be repeated (such as DAILY or WEEKLY). Required. Currently only the WEEKLY value is supported.
  INTERVAL — Works together with FREQ to specify how often the session should be repeated. For example, FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2 means once every two weeks. Optional. Default value is 1.
  COUNT — The number of times this event should be repeated. Not yet supported.
  UNTIL — The date or date-time until which the session should be repeated. This parameter is optional. When it is not specified, the event repeats forever.
  BYDAY - The days of the week when the event should be repeated. Currently, only a single day is supported. This parameter is mandatory.
       Possible values are: MO, TU, WE, TH, FR, SA, SU
       Note that DTSTART and DTEND lines are not allowed in this field; session start and end times are specified in the start and end fields.
       **Example**: FREQ=WEEKLY;INTERVAL=2;BYDAY=MO;UNTIL=20200427T070000Z

members.name: forceInPersonCheckout
members.doc:
when defined as true, checkout the booking as "in-person" method.
 required BOOKINGS.MANAGE_PAYMENTS permission.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: member id for paid plans, may be valid only when identity is owner

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the checkout flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

members.name: forceInPersonCheckout
members.doc:
when defined as true, charge the booking as "in-person" method.
 required BOOKINGS.MANAGE_PAYMENTS permission.

members.name: flowControlSettings
members.doc: Sets the charge flow behavior, some behaviors required permissions.

members.name: paymentSelection
members.doc: Selected rate label (optional) to be used, and number of participants.

members.name: couponCode
members.doc: Coupon to apply to price calculations. An error will be thrown if given coupon is invalid.

members.name: contactId
members.doc: Member ID for which paid plans will be accessed.

members.name: createSession
members.doc:
A session that will be created for this booking.
 schedule_id, schedule_owner_id, start, and rate are used to calculate the checkout options.
 Start is used to access the relevant paid plans.

members.name: sessionId
members.doc: Existing session ID.

members.name: scheduleId
members.doc: Existing schedule ID. Will be used to access service properties including payment options, rate, and first session start time that will be used to access relevant plans.

members.name: checkoutOptions
members.doc: Checkout options.

members.name: payments
members.doc: Transaction details.

members.name: paidPlans
members.doc: Paid plans available for checkout.

docs.summary:
Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • COMPLETE - nothing left to pay.
  • PENDING_CASHIER - cashier order id exists. waiting for callback
  • REJECTED - rejected checkout request
  • READY - initial state of non-cashier flow, expect balance adjustment
  • CANCELED - canceled CHECKOUT
  • REFUNDED
  • PENDING_MERCHANT
  • WIX_PAY_FAILURE
  • PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID - Offline transaction, will be complete when explicitly updated to balance mark as paid
  • PENDING_BUYER - Transaction actually started, cause of pending can be fraud check at provider side, long bank transfer, etc.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CREATED
  • PENDING_MERCHANT
  • COMPLETE
  • FAILED - cashier is unavailable or failed processing
  • DECLINED
  • PENDING_MARK_AS_PAID
  • CANCELED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • NEW_MESSAGE
  • UPDATE_MESSAGE

Enumerates the days of the week. Possible values are:
  • MONDAY
  • TUESDAY
  • WEDNESDAY
  • THURSDAY
  • FRIDAY
  • SATURDAY
  • SUNDAY

Possible values are:
  • ACTIVE
  • IN_ACTIVE

Possible values are:
  • UNKNOWN
  • BRANCH
  • OFFICES
  • RECEPTION
  • HEADQUARTERS

Where the hint should be displayed Possible values are:
  • BEFORE
  • AFTER
  • REPLACE

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • OWNER_BUSINESS - The address is determined by the business address as set by the owner in the site’s general settings.
  • OWNER_CUSTOM - The address is determined by the owner.
  • CUSTOM - The address is determined and managed elsewhere

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • PENDING
  • APPROVED
  • DECLINED

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • FREE - Indicates the schedule is available.
  • BUSY - Indicates the schedule is not available. Default value.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • EVENT - The session type is event. Represents a calendar event of this session schedule owner. This is the default type.
  • WORKING_HOURS - Deprecated. The session type is working hours. Represents intervals that masked as working hours in the schedule owner schedule.
  • TIME_AVAILABILITY - Deprecated
  • AVAILABILITY - A new type for replacing WORKING_HOURS.

Possible values are:
  • UNDEFINED
  • CONFIRMED - The session is confirmed. This is the default status.
  • CANCELLED - The session is cancelled (deleted). Can be cancelled exceptions of a recurring interval indicate that this session should no longer be presented, or can be deleted single session. The ListSessions returns cancelled sessions only if 'includeDelete' flag is set to true.
